column4: Can anybody confirm this problem in gnome-terminal?  When in gnome-terminal, press Shift+Ctrl+T, does it open a new tab or a whole 'nother terminal.  My term opens a whole new term, which ain't right!
dang, that sucks for me, i guess
well, is there any reason why it wouldn't open a new tab?
must be u cause when i try it opens another tab
